content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To help you navigate during your first days we've created a map, where you can find the location of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"public transport stops, lunch services and parking:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":497902,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4709308f-2d43-4061-af78-55d807e4b95e/MAP.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4709308f-2d43-4061-af78-55d807e4b95e/MAP.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"MAP.pdf\",\"name\":\"MAP.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"4709308f-2d43-4061-af78-55d807e4b95e\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that to get access to bike parking in Kuprevicha, 3V or Kuprevicha, 1/1, you'll need to send a request to the Security Team after your start date.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To use car parking in Kuprevicha, 3V, you'll need to add your mobile phone number to our internal profile management system after your start date.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
